players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I find it strange that Bob was the one who was killed during the night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out what could have led to this."
You: "I'm shocked about Bob too. We need to be really careful and think about who might have targeted him. Does anyone have any insights or observations from before the night phase?"
You: "Since no one else is sharing insights, maybe we should vote to eliminate someone today. Charlie, you were the only one speaking up earlier - what are your thoughts on who we should suspect?"
